headline: Church & Dwight to Present at the dbAccess Global Consumer Conference
summary: EWING, N.J., May 23, 2025--Church & Dwight Co., Inc. (NYSE: CHD) announced today that President and Chief Executive Officer Rick Dierker, Chief Financial Officer Lee McChesney, and Executive Vice President of International Michael Read will participate in a fireside chat at the dbAccess Global Consumer Conference on Tuesday, June 3, at 8:45 a.m. ET (2:45 p.m. CEST). A link to the broadcast will be provided through the Investors section of the Church & Dwight’s website.
